title: Essential Hide Site Activities
brief: Limit activities in hide sites to essential tasks that don't compromise your position.
steps: Step 1: Maintain security through continuous visual scanning and listening.
Step 2: Rest in rotation so all team members can sleep while maintaining watch.
Step 3: Apply and maintain camouflage using buddy system to ensure completeness.
Step 4: Plan your next movement using map reconnaissance and route selection.
Step 5: Treat all injuries immediately, no matter how minor.
warnings: Do not build fires or prepare food - smoke and food odors will reveal your location.
Never sacrifice security for rest - always maintain watch.
Do not occupy hide site longer than 24 hours maximum.
Sterilize the hide site before leaving to prevent tracking.
